snippet.title: Robot Rumble 2 - Alpha Gameplay Trailer #2 - Robot Workshop
snippet.description:
Build. Battle.

Fulfill your dream of creating the ultimate fighting robot.

This trailer showcases the Robot Rumble 2 robot workshop.  Design custom 3D shapes using the shape editor, texture the shapes using the painter, then assemble and do battle with your custom-designed robot in the arena.

Be sure to add us to your Steam wishlist!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/884180/Robot_Rumble_2/

To sign up to be a closed Beta tester, head over to our website:

http://www.robot-rumble.com

To follow the progress of the game, check us out on Twitter, Facebook, and www.gametechmods.com:

https://twitter.com/RobotRumbleGame
https://www.facebook.com/RobotRumbleGame/
https://gametechmods.com/forums/robot-rumble-2-0/robot-rumble-2-0-robot-combat-simulator-under-development/
